channel.title: What do you think?
channel.description:
Would you think this game is worth getting back into if you had to start from scratch once again? Now with huge amounts of bots gone, you could actually train.
I haven't played in almost 2 years now, I want to see if being a noob is as fun as it used to be. My old account was hacked, so it discourages me a bit, but would it be worth raising an account up again, or should I stick to just playing Terraria and Minecraft?

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Don’t think so. If you’ve been a member with a high level account you probably won’t find it enjoyable to be a newbie again since you’re like missing adventure.

It was more fun at the beginning when you were learning new stuff about the game everyday while training your account.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Im going to give it a try and play agian after like a year

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Yeah, I just wanted to know if that sense of adventure and awe (yes I rollplay when I play games) was still there after they turned it into a child’s playground a couple years ago.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Being a noob will never be the same.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

I recently got back into it, although the economy is still ruined maybe it will change soon? I find it more enjoyable now, a lot more peaceful game play back to the old days.

Read full topic
